## node2 variable

Syntax sugar for `node()`<!-- -->, intended for nodes w/ 2 inputs, by default named `a` &amp; `b` (but can be overridden).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
node2: (xform: Transducer<IObjectOf<any>, any>, inputIDs?: Tuple<string, 2>, reset?: boolean) => NodeFactory<any>
```
